## useToggle() function

A hook for a toggleable state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useToggle(defaultValue?: boolean): [boolean | undefined, () => void];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defaultValue | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> The default value for the toggle |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[boolean \| undefined, () =&gt; void\]

The current toggle state as well as a function that can be called to toggle the state
